    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet TextCategory_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:TextCategory_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<TextCategory caption="Example String Value" category="2" removalInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</Text>
</TextCategory>

      Example JSON

      {
  "TextCategory" : {
    "category" : "2",
    "caption" : "Example String Value",
    "removalInd" : true,
    "Text" : [ {
      "value" : "Formatted text example.",
      "language" : "en",
      "textFormat" : "PlainText"
    } ]
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Text
        A set of text of a given category.
        Details
        Type Text
        Example Value Formatted text example.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100000

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        category
        Specifies the video category. Refer to OpenTravel Code list Picture Category Code (PIC).
        Details
        Type OTA_Code
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9A-Z]{1,4}(\.[A-Z]{3}(\.X){0,1}){0,1}
        Max Occurrences 1
        caption
        The caption associated to a specific text category which can be provided in different languages.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        removalInd
        If true, this item is obsolete and should be removed from the receiving system.
